thread.title: Jury convicts Pa. man accused of stalking boy for 2 years
thread.title_full: Jury convicts Pa. man accused of stalking boy for 2 years

title: Jury convicts Pa. man accused of stalking boy for 2 years
text:
Published By: Philly News - Today 
ALLENTOWN, Pa. (AP) - An eastern Pennsylvania man has been found guilty of stalking a young boy for over two years....
